simulation.lexicon

Interface WeightedLexicon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Lexicon
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LimitedWeightsLexicon

    public interface WeightedLexicon
extends Lexicon
    An interface of lexicons in which each thing-word association is given a double-valued weight.
    See Also:
    LimitedWeightsLexicon, WeightedLexiconAgent, SuccessCountingAgent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Thing thing, Word word, double weight)
      Adds the association between the given thing and the given word with the given weight to this lexicon.
      java.util.Map<Language,java.lang.Double> countWeightSums(java.util.Collection<Language> languages)
      Returns a map from the given collection of languages to numbers such that each language is mapped to sum of weights of words from this lexicon belonging to this language.
      void decreaseOtherWeights(Thing thing, Word word, double by)
      Decreases the weight of all associations of the given thing except for the association with the given word by the valu of by.
      void decreaseWeight(Thing thing, Word word, double by)
      Decreases the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word by the value of by.
      void increaseWeight(Thing thing, Word word, double by)
      Increases the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word by the value of by.
      double weight(Thing thing, Word word)
      Returns the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word in this lexicon.

        add, contains, contains, countDominatingWords, oneToOne, recognizedThings, signal, things, words

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Thing thing,
         Word word,
         double weight)
        Adds the association between the given thing and the given word with the given weight to this lexicon.
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing to be added in association with the given word to this lexicon
        word - a word to be added in association with the given thing to this lexicon
        weight - a weight of the added association

      • weight

        double weight(Thing thing,
              Word word)
        Returns the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word in this lexicon.
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing to be checked for the weight of association with the given word
        word - a word to be checked for the weight of association with the given thing
        Returns:
        the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word in this lexicon.

      • increaseWeight

        void increaseWeight(Thing thing,
                    Word word,
                    double by)
        Increases the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word by the value of by.
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing from the association of which the weight should be increased
        word - a word from the association of which the weight should be increased
        by - value to increase the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word

      • decreaseOtherWeights

        void decreaseOtherWeights(Thing thing,
                          Word word,
                          double by)
        Decreases the weight of all associations of the given thing except for the association with the given word by the valu of by.
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing of which associations should be included by this method
        word - a word from the association of which the weight should not be decreased
        by - value to decrease the weights of all associations of the given thing except for the association with the given word

      • decreaseWeight

        void decreaseWeight(Thing thing,
                    Word word,
                    double by)
        Decreases the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word by the value of by.
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing from the association of which the weight should be decreased
        word - a word from the association of which the weight should be decreased
        by - value to decrease the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word

      • countWeightSums

        java.util.Map<Language,java.lang.Double> countWeightSums(java.util.Collection<Language> languages)
        Returns a map from the given collection of languages to numbers such that each language is mapped to sum of weights of words from this lexicon belonging to this language.
        Parameters:
        languages - a collection of languages to be a domain of returned map
        Returns:
        a map from the given collection of languages to numbers such that each language is mapped to sum of weights of words from this lexicon belonging to this language.
